subject: Talladega Superspeedway
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya, who is not in the Chase for the Sprint Cup playoffs, grabbed a sliver of the spotlight by winning the pole for Sunday’s race at Talladega.
snippet: Juan Pablo Montoya, who is not in the Chase for the Sprint Cup playoffs, grabbed a sliver of the spotlight by winning the pole for Sunday’s race at Talladega.
